snippet: UPDATE: Bellevue Hospital Center, one of the city's busiest trauma centers, temporarily stopped accepting non-psychiatric emergency patients as a result of a computer problem, the hospital said.
abstract: UPDATE: Bellevue Hospital Center, one of the city's busiest trauma centers, temporarily stopped accepting non-psychiatric emergency patients as a result of a computer problem, the hospital said.

headline.main: Bellevue Hospital Briefly Limits Emergency Cases
